alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Forsyth; Guilford; Randolph (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 8:07PM EDT until June 26 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Forsyth County in central North Carolina... Northeastern Davidson County in central North Carolina... Northwestern Randolph County in central North Carolina... Southwestern Guilford County in central North Carolina... * Until 900 PM EDT. * At 806 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Clemmons, or 9 miles south of Winston-Salem, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Winston-Salem, High Point, Asheboro, Lexington, Randleman, Thomasville, Archdale, Trinity, Pleasant Garden and Jamestown. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
